text:
My SNS notifications won't stop...!
What should I do about this...

It's amazing how much attention you get
from being on TV...

Yeah, maybe for now, instead of replying right away,
how about taking your time to read some comments?
That sounds like a good idea...!

Hehe...
Even just one comment fills my heart...
I feel a bit... relieved now...

I'm not sure if what I wanted to convey...
Has been conveyed to everyone...

In some way...
I was able to move someone's heart, huh.
